This Privacy Policy explains how PropMate collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal data.

1. Information We Collect

  • Name
  • Email address
  • Cryptocurrency wallet address
  • Proof of purchase (screenshots, receipts)
  • Cookies for affiliate tracking and analytics

2. How We Use Your Information

  • Process and deliver cashback payments.
  • Verify purchases with prop firms in case of disputes.
  • Send promotional and transactional emails.
  • Prevent fraud and abuse.

3. Data Sharing

We only share your purchase-related information with prop firms when necessary for verification. We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

4. Data Storage & Security

All data is stored in Supabase (PostgreSQL database) with:

  • Encryption in transit (HTTPS) and encryption at rest (AES-256).
  • Row-Level Security (RLS) to restrict unauthorized access.
  • Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) on administrator accounts.

Access to data is limited to authorized PropMate staff.

5. Data Retention

We retain user data for 5 years after the last transaction, unless required to keep it longer by law. After this period, data is securely deleted.

6. Cookies

  • We use cookies for affiliate tracking and website analytics.
  • You may disable cookies in your browser, but doing so may prevent cashback tracking.

7. Your Rights

  • Request a copy of the data we hold about you.
  • Request deletion of your personal data.
  • Opt-out of promotional emails at any time.

8. International Users

By using PropMate, you agree that your data may be stored and processed in countries outside your own, including Pakistan.

9. Updates to Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be posted on our website with a revised date.
